items.sentence: Tom rolled over and snoozed for another 15 minutes.
I know you don\'t want to talk about what happened.
I probably shouldn\'t have asked Tom that question.
Tom poured the contents of his glass into the sink.
Tom pretended not to notice that Mary was sleeping.
Tom saw Mary stealing money from the cash register.
Tom seems to be suffering from a guilty conscience.
Tom seems to be unwilling to listen to suggestions.
Tom shot a bear with the rifle his father gave him.
Tom can get there in ten minutes if he drives fast.
